Name: Acid Burst (Latch)
Description: When this character or its host takes damage, all adjacent foes take 1 piercing damage. Increase this damage to 2 piercing against poisoned characters. This effect can trigger any number of times a round.

Name: Aquatic
Description: Can move through all spaces of its own deep water areas normally, and moving through those spaces costs 0 movement for it.

Name: Bubble Barrier
Description: The fish and its host have cover from all directions. Any foe that ends its turn adjacent to the host is shoved 1 away from it.

Name: Chitinous Coil
Description: The Gigantapede occupies an arc 6 space instead of a normal space for its size. Only its first and last space are attackable or can be used to make attacks or abilities, but its entire body causes obstruction and engagement. Keep track of which is the head, and which is the tail. Only one space can be hit if both are included in the area of an attack or ability (attacker chooses which). When it moves, move its head, then rearrange its body in any valid configuration.

Name: Cursed Deeps
Description: When it enters the battlefield, creates four terrain effects, blast 1 areas of cursed deep water. The center space is a pit, and all other spaces are difficult terrain. None can be placed within range 4 of each other.

Name: Dart
Description: At the start of its turn, the land shark shoves itself as far as possible towards the closest foe. If the closest foe is standing on an object, as soon as the shark would move onto the object's space, it collides with it and stops moving.

Name: Filter
Description: The fish and its host are immune to blights.

Name: Hyperactive
Description: When overdrive triggers, this beast gains +1 action for the rest of combat.

Name: Hyperactive (Improved)
Description: When overdrive triggers, this beast gains +1 action and removes all recharges from its abilities for the rest of combat.

Name: Iron Scales
Description: When either the head or the tail of the Gigantapede takes damage from an ability, after that ability resolves, that body part gains resistance until the other body part takes damage from an ability. This effect swaps between head and tail indefinitely.

Name: Landswim
Description: The shark has evasion and phasing. The shark cannot move through objects. If the shark collides with an object, it is stunned and loses this trait until the end of its next turn.

Name: Latch
Description: Starts combat sharing the same space as another ally the same size or larger. While latched on, can't move, but instead moves with its host. Being moved out of its host's space end this effect. If the Symbiote is shoved or teleported away, it can pass a save to avoid the effect and become immune to shove or teleports until the end of the current turn. Can latch on to a new adjacent allied character with 1 action or its standard move.

Name: Latch Enrage
Description: If latched on and enraged, also grants +1 action to its host. This doesn't stack with a host's enrage.

Name: Latch Defiance
Description: While latched on to a character, that character gains defiance at the start of each of its turns.

Name: Lure
Description: At the start of its turn as a free action, the Fisher puts a lure out in a space within range 3 of its location, or moves its current lure 1 space. The lure is a size 1 intangible summon. It cannot be placed or moved adjacent to the Kingfisher outside of the Fisher's reel action, and only one lure can be placed at once. If the Fisher moves further away from range 3 from its lure, unsummon it.

Name: Malicious Latch
Description: Can latch on to an adjacent foe as an action or by using its standard move. A foe can pass a save to avoid this effect, and can repeat the save at the end of their turns, ending it on a success and shoving the ape into a free adjacent space. While latched on to a foe, the foe is pacified+ and the ape can choose whether any of the ape's abilities apply to it or not.

Name: Perfect Camouflage
Description: The Fisher is intangible unless there's a character adjacent to its Lure.

Name: Rolling Boulder
Description: Rampage goes 4 spaces, ignores all movement penalties, and the lizard can phase through characters during it.
